question: Assalam u alaikum, i am aware that men are allowed to shave their legs in islam, but can i ask if there is a preferred method. Shaving causes a lot of itchiness you see. Please help.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
We are unaware of any particular preferred method of shaving ones legs.
Whilst it is permissible it is not advisable to do so. Fataawa Mahmoodia
Vol 15 Page 385 )

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
